pages.text: $(li)Tired of not being able to transport certain creatures or blocks easily? Don't worry, I have the solution!$(br)$(li)Just press shift and right click simultaneously while you are pointing to the specific creature or block that you want to carry.$(br)$(li)For example, you can carry Passive Animals and Chests.
$(li)If this block or creature can be transported using this method, it will end in your hands.$(br2)Insert a PICTURE of you carrying something

$(li)Be careful! Depending of the size of the creature or block that you are carriying, you will receive a highger or lower Slowness effect, reducing your walking speed.$(br)$(li)Some creatures can be stacked on each other.
